markdown:
<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">
[Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=1509)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 328 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Mystery**
[Tempest](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=19)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 or 2 creatures
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

An arc of lightning leaps from one target to another. Each target takes 2d4 electricity damage with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d4.
name: Electric Arc
